## ğŸš€ Phase 1: çˆ¬è™«æ§åˆ¶APIï¼ˆä¼˜å…ˆçº§é«˜ï¼‰

é¦–å…ˆåˆ›å»ºçˆ¬è™«å®æ—¶æ§åˆ¶APIï¼š

```diff
+ # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
+ """
+ çˆ¬è™«æ§åˆ¶API - å®æ—¶æ§åˆ¶ã€å‚æ•°çƒ­æ›´æ–°ã€é”™è¯¯è‡ªæ„ˆ
+ æ”¯æŒRESTful APIè§„èŒƒï¼Œå»¶è¿Ÿ<500ms
+ """
+ 
+ import asyncio
+ import time
+ from datetime import datetime, timedelta
+ from typing import Dict, List, Optional, Any
+ from flask import Blueprint, request, jsonify, current_app
+ from dataclasses import dataclass, asdict
+ import threading
+ import queue
+ import traceback
+ import json
+ from functools import wraps
+ 
+ from backend.newslook.core.config_manager import get_config
+ from backend.newslook.core.logger_manager import get_logger
+ from backend.newslook.crawlers.manager import CrawlerManager
+ 
+ 
+ # åˆ›å»ºè“å›¾
+ crawler_control_bp = Blueprint('crawler_control', __name__, url_prefix='/api/v1/crawlers')
+ 
+ logger = get_logger(__name__)
+ config = get_config()
+ 
+ # å…¨å±€çˆ¬è™«ç®¡ç†å™¨å®ä¾‹
+ _crawler_manager: Optional[CrawlerManager] = None
+ _retry_queue = queue.Queue()
+ _error_history: List[Dict] = []
+ 
+ @dataclass
+ class CrawlerStatus:
+     """çˆ¬è™«çŠ¶æ€æ•°æ®ç±»"""
+     id: str
+     name: str
+     status: str  # running, stopped, error, starting, stopping
+     last_run: Optional[str] = None
+     last_error: Optional[str] = None
+     next_retry: Optional[str] = None
+     success_count: int = 0
+     error_count: int = 0
+     current_params: Dict = None
+     performance_metrics: Dict = None
+ 
+ 
+ def get_crawler_manager() -> CrawlerManager:
+     """è·å–çˆ¬è™«ç®¡ç†å™¨å•ä¾‹"""
+     global _crawler_manager
+     if _crawler_manager is None:
+         _crawler_manager = CrawlerManager()
+     return _crawler_manager
+ 
+ 
+ def performance_monitor(f):
+     """æ€§èƒ½ç›‘æ§è£…é¥°å™¨ - ç¡®ä¿APIå“åº”æ—¶é—´<500ms"""
+     @wraps(f)
+     def decorated_function(*args, **kwargs):
+         start_time = time.time()
+         try:
+             result = f(*args, **kwargs)
+             response_time = (time.time() - start_time) * 1000
+             
+             # è®°å½•å“åº”æ—¶é—´
+             if response_time > 500:
+                 logger.warning(f"API {f.__name__} å“åº”æ—¶é—´è¶…æ ‡: {response_time:.2f}ms")
+             
+             # æ·»åŠ æ€§èƒ½å¤´
+             if isinstance(result, tuple):
+                 response, status_code = result
+                 if isinstance(response, dict):
+                     response['_performance'] = {
+                         'response_time_ms': round(response_time, 2),
+                         'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat()
+                     }
+                 return response, status_code
+             else:
+                 if isinstance(result, dict):
+                     result['_performance'] = {
+                         'response_time_ms': round(response_time, 2),
+                         'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat()
+                     }
+                 return result
+                 
+         except Exception as e:
+             response_time = (time.time() - start_time) * 1000
+             logger.error(f"API {f.__name__} æ‰§è¡Œå¼‚å¸¸: {str(e)}, å“åº”æ—¶é—´: {response_time:.2f}ms")
+             return {
+                 'error': str(e),
+                 'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(),
+                 '_performance': {
+                     'response_time_ms': round(response_time, 2),
+                     'error': True
+                 }
+             }, 500
+     
+     return decorated_function
+ 
+ 
+ def error_recovery_handler(crawler_id: str, error: Exception):
+     """é”™è¯¯è‡ªæ„ˆå¤„ç†å™¨"""
+     global _error_history, _retry_queue
+     
+     error_info = {
+         'crawler_id': crawler_id,
+         'error': str(error),
+         'traceback': traceback.format_exc(),
+         'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(),
+         'retry_count': 0
+     }
+     
+     # è®°å½•é”™è¯¯å†å²
+     _error_history.append(error_info)
+     if len(_error_history) > 1000:  # ä¿æŒæœ€è¿‘1000æ¡é”™è¯¯è®°å½•
+         _error_history.pop(0)
+     
+     # æ·»åŠ åˆ°é‡è¯•é˜Ÿåˆ—
+     _retry_queue.put(error_info)
+     
+     logger.error(f"çˆ¬è™« {crawler_id} å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯ï¼Œå·²æ·»åŠ åˆ°é‡è¯•é˜Ÿåˆ—: {str(error)}")
+ 
+ 
+ def retry_worker():
+     """é‡è¯•é˜Ÿåˆ—å¤„ç†å·¥ä½œè€…"""
+     global _retry_queue
+     
+     while True:
+         try:
+             if not _retry_queue.empty():
+                 error_info = _retry_queue.get(timeout=5)
+                 crawler_id = error_info['crawler_id']
+                 retry_count = error_info['retry_count']
+                 
+                 # æŒ‡æ•°é€€é¿ç®—æ³•
+                 wait_time = min(2 ** retry_count, 300)  # æœ€å¤§ç­‰å¾…5åˆ†é’Ÿ
+                 time.sleep(wait_time)
+                 
+                 if retry_count < 3:  # æœ€å¤šé‡è¯•3æ¬¡
+                     try:
+                         manager = get_crawler_manager()
+                         if crawler_id in manager.crawlers:
+                             # å°è¯•é‡æ–°å¯åŠ¨çˆ¬è™«
+                             manager.start_crawler(crawler_id)
+                             logger.info(f"æˆåŠŸé‡å¯çˆ¬è™« {crawler_id}ï¼Œç¬¬ {retry_count + 1} æ¬¡é‡è¯•")
+                         else:
+                             logger.warning(f"çˆ¬è™« {crawler_id} ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œæ— æ³•é‡è¯•")
+                             
+                     except Exception as e:
+                         # é‡è¯•å¤±è´¥ï¼Œé‡æ–°åŠ å…¥é˜Ÿåˆ—
+                         error_info['retry_count'] = retry_count + 1
+                         _retry_queue.put(error_info)
+                         logger.warning(f"çˆ¬è™« {crawler_id} é‡è¯•å¤±è´¥ï¼Œç¬¬ {retry_count + 1} æ¬¡: {str(e)}")
+                 else:
+                     logger.error(f"çˆ¬è™« {crawler_id} é‡è¯•æ¬¡æ•°å·²è¾¾ä¸Šé™ï¼Œåœæ­¢é‡è¯•")
+             else:
+                 time.sleep(1)
+                 
+         except queue.Empty:
+             continue
+         except Exception as e:
+             logger.error(f"é‡è¯•é˜Ÿåˆ—å¤„ç†å¼‚å¸¸: {str(e)}")
+             time.sleep(5)
+ 
+ 
+ # å¯åŠ¨é‡è¯•å·¥ä½œè€…çº¿ç¨‹
+ retry_thread = threading.Thread(target=retry_worker, daemon=True)
+ retry_thread.start()
+ 
+ @crawler_control_bp.route('', methods=['GET'])
+ @performance_monitor
+ def list_crawlers():
+     """è·å–æ‰€æœ‰çˆ¬è™«åˆ—è¡¨"""
+     try:
+         manager = get_crawler_manager()
+         crawlers = []
+         
+         for name, crawler in manager.crawlers.items():
+             status = get_crawler_status(name, crawler)
+             crawlers.append(asdict(status))
+         
+         return {
+             'success': True,
+             'data': crawlers,
+             'total': len(crawlers),
+             'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat()
+         }
+         
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"è·å–çˆ¬è™«åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
+         return {'error': str(e), 'success': False}, 500
+ 
+ 
+ @crawler_control_bp.route('/<crawler_id>', methods=['GET'])
+ @performance_monitor
+ def get_crawler_detail(crawler_id: str):
+     """è·å–å•ä¸ªçˆ¬è™«è¯¦æƒ…"""
+     try:
+         manager = get_crawler_manager()
+         
+         if crawler_id not in manager.crawlers:
+             return {'error': f'çˆ¬è™« {crawler_id} ä¸å­˜åœ¨', 'success': False}, 404
+         
+         crawler = manager.crawlers[crawler_id]
+         status = get_crawler_status(crawler_id, crawler)
+         
+         return {
+             'success': True,
+             'data': asdict(status),
+             'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat()
+         }
+         
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"è·å–çˆ¬è™«è¯¦æƒ…å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
+         return {'error': str(e), 'success': False}, 500
+ 
+ 
+ @crawler_control_bp.route('/<crawler_id>/toggle', methods=['POST'])
+ @performance_monitor
+ def toggle_crawler(crawler_id: str):
+     """å®æ—¶å¯åœçˆ¬è™« - æ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½"""
+     try:
+         manager = get_crawler_manager()
+         
+         if crawler_id not in manager.crawlers:
+             return {'error': f'çˆ¬è™« {crawler_id} ä¸å­˜åœ¨', 'success': False}, 404
+         
+         # è·å–å½“å‰çŠ¶æ€
+         current_status = manager.get_status().get(crawler_id, {}).get('status', 'stopped')
+         
+         try:
+             if current_status == 'running':
+                 # åœæ­¢çˆ¬è™«
+                 manager.stop_crawler(crawler_id)
+                 new_status = 'stopped'
+                 action = 'stopped'
+             else:
+                 # å¯åŠ¨çˆ¬è™«
+                 manager.start_crawler(crawler_id)
+                 new_status = 'running' 
+                 action = 'started'
+             
+             # è·å–æ›´æ–°åçš„çŠ¶æ€
+             crawler = manager.crawlers[crawler_id]
+             status = get_crawler_status(crawler_id, crawler)
+             status.status = new_status
+             
+             return {
+                 'success': True,
+                 'action': action,
+                 'data': asdict(status),
+                 'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat()
+             }
+             
+         except Exception as e:
+             # é”™è¯¯è‡ªæ„ˆ
+             error_recovery_handler(crawler_id, e)
+             raise e
+         
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"åˆ‡æ¢çˆ¬è™«çŠ¶æ€å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
+         return {
+             'error': str(e), 
+             'success': False,
+             'crawler_id': crawler_id,
+             'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat()
+         }, 500
+ 
+ 
+ @crawler_control_bp.route('/<crawler_id>/params', methods=['PATCH'])
+ @performance_monitor
+ def update_crawler_params(crawler_id: str):
+     """å‚æ•°çƒ­æ›´æ–° - ä¸é‡å¯çˆ¬è™«çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹æ›´æ–°å‚æ•°"""
+     try:
+         manager = get_crawler_manager()
+         
+         if crawler_id not in manager.crawlers:
+             return {'error': f'çˆ¬è™« {crawler_id} ä¸å­˜åœ¨', 'success': False}, 404
+         
+         # è·å–æ›´æ–°å‚æ•°
+         params = request.get_json() or {}
+         if not params:
+             return {'error': 'æœªæä¾›æ›´æ–°å‚æ•°', 'success': False}, 400
+         
+         crawler = manager.crawlers[crawler_id]
+         old_params = {}
+         updated_params = {}
+         
+         # æ”¯æŒçš„çƒ­æ›´æ–°å‚æ•°
+         hotswap_params = {
+             'delay': 'crawler_delay',
+             'timeout': 'timeout', 
+             'concurrent': 'max_concurrent',
+             'user_agent': 'user_agent',
+             'headers': 'headers',
+             'proxy': 'proxy_config'
+         }
+         
+         for param_key, param_value in params.items():
+             if param_key in hotswap_params:
+                 attr_name = hotswap_params[param_key]
+                 
+                 # ä¿å­˜æ—§å€¼
+                 if hasattr(crawler, attr_name):
+                     old_params[param_key] = getattr(crawler, attr_name)
+                 
+                 # è®¾ç½®æ–°å€¼
+                 if hasattr(crawler, attr_name):
+                     setattr(crawler, attr_name, param_value)
+                     updated_params[param_key] = param_value
+                     logger.info(f"çˆ¬è™« {crawler_id} å‚æ•° {param_key} å·²æ›´æ–°: {param_value}")
+         
+         if not updated_params:
+             return {'error': 'æ²¡æœ‰å¯æ›´æ–°çš„å‚æ•°', 'success': False}, 400
+         
+         # è·å–æ›´æ–°åçš„çŠ¶æ€
+         status = get_crawler_status(crawler_id, crawler)
+         
+         return {
+             'success': True,
+             'updated_params': updated_params,
+             'old_params': old_params,
+             'data': asdict(status),
+             'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat()
+         }
+         
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"æ›´æ–°çˆ¬è™«å‚æ•°å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
+         return {'error': str(e), 'success': False}, 500
+ 
+ 
+ @crawler_control_bp.route('/<crawler_id>/status', methods=['GET'])
+ @performance_monitor  
+ def get_crawler_status_api(crawler_id: str):
+     """è·å–çˆ¬è™«å®æ—¶çŠ¶æ€"""
+     try:
+         manager = get_crawler_manager()
+         
+         if crawler_id not in manager.crawlers:
+             return {'error': f'çˆ¬è™« {crawler_id} ä¸å­˜åœ¨', 'success': False}, 404
+         
+         crawler = manager.crawlers[crawler_id]
+         status = get_crawler_status(crawler_id, crawler)
+         
+         return {
+             'success': True,
+             'data': asdict(status),
+             'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat()
+         }
+         
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"è·å–çˆ¬è™«çŠ¶æ€å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
+         return {'error': str(e), 'success': False}, 500
+ 
+ 
+ @crawler_control_bp.route('/batch/toggle', methods=['POST'])
+ @performance_monitor
+ def batch_toggle_crawlers():
+     """æ‰¹é‡åˆ‡æ¢çˆ¬è™«çŠ¶æ€"""
+     try:
+         data = request.get_json() or {}
+         crawler_ids = data.get('crawler_ids', [])
+         action = data.get('action', 'toggle')  # toggle, start, stop
+         
+         if not crawler_ids:
+             return {'error': 'æœªæŒ‡å®šçˆ¬è™«IDåˆ—è¡¨', 'success': False}, 400
+         
+         manager = get_crawler_manager()
+         results = []
+         
+         for crawler_id in crawler_ids:
+             if crawler_id not in manager.crawlers:
+                 results.append({
+                     'crawler_id': crawler_id,
+                     'success': False,
+                     'error': f'çˆ¬è™« {crawler_id} ä¸å­˜åœ¨'
+                 })
+                 continue
+             
+             try:
+                 current_status = manager.get_status().get(crawler_id, {}).get('status', 'stopped')
+                 
+                 if action == 'start' or (action == 'toggle' and current_status != 'running'):
+                     manager.start_crawler(crawler_id)
+                     new_status = 'running'
+                     performed_action = 'started'
+                 elif action == 'stop' or (action == 'toggle' and current_status == 'running'):
+                     manager.stop_crawler(crawler_id)
+                     new_status = 'stopped'
+                     performed_action = 'stopped'
+                 else:
+                     new_status = current_status
+                     performed_action = 'no_change'
+                 
+                 results.append({
+                     'crawler_id': crawler_id,
+                     'success': True,
+                     'action': performed_action,
+                     'status': new_status
+                 })
+                 
+             except Exception as e:
+                 error_recovery_handler(crawler_id, e)
+                 results.append({
+                     'crawler_id': crawler_id,
+                     'success': False,
+                     'error': str(e)
+                 })
+         
+         return {
+             'success': True,
+             'results': results,
+             'total': len(crawler_ids),
+             'successful': len([r for r in results if r['success']]),
+             'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat()
+         }
+         
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"æ‰¹é‡æ“ä½œçˆ¬è™«å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
+         return {'error': str(e), 'success': False}, 500
+ 
+ 
+ @crawler_control_bp.route('/errors', methods=['GET'])
+ @performance_monitor
+ def get_error_history():
+     """è·å–é”™è¯¯å†å²å’Œé‡è¯•é˜Ÿåˆ—çŠ¶æ€"""
+     try:
+         global _error_history, _retry_queue
+         
+         # åˆ†é¡µå‚æ•°
+         page = request.args.get('page', 1, type=int)
+         per_page = min(request.args.get('per_page', 20, type=int), 100)
+         
+         # è¿‡æ»¤å‚æ•°
+         crawler_id = request.args.get('crawler_id')
+         
+         # è¿‡æ»¤é”™è¯¯å†å²
+         filtered_errors = _error_history
+         if crawler_id:
+             filtered_errors = [e for e in _error_history if e['crawler_id'] == crawler_id]
+         
+         # åˆ†é¡µ
+         start = (page - 1) * per_page
+         end = start + per_page
+         paged_errors = filtered_errors[start:end]
+         
+         return {
+             'success': True,
+             'data': {
+                 'errors': paged_errors,
+                 'pagination': {
+                     'page': page,
+                     'per_page': per_page,
+                     'total': len(filtered_errors),
+                     'pages': (len(filtered_errors) + per_page - 1) // per_page
+                 },
+                 'retry_queue_size': _retry_queue.qsize(),
+                 'total_errors': len(_error_history)
+             },
+             'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat()
+         }
+         
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"è·å–é”™è¯¯å†å²å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
+         return {'error': str(e), 'success': False}, 500
+ 
+ 
+ def get_crawler_status(crawler_id: str, crawler) -> CrawlerStatus:
+     """è·å–çˆ¬è™«çŠ¶æ€ä¿¡æ¯"""
+     try:
+         manager = get_crawler_manager()
+         manager_status = manager.get_status()
+         
+         crawler_info = manager_status.get(crawler_id, {})
+         
+         # è·å–æœ€è¿‘çš„é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯
+         recent_errors = [e for e in _error_history if e['crawler_id'] == crawler_id]
+         last_error = recent_errors[-1]['error'] if recent_errors else None
+         
+         # è®¡ç®—ä¸‹æ¬¡é‡è¯•æ—¶é—´
+         next_retry = None
+         if last_error:
+             last_error_time = datetime.fromisoformat(recent_errors[-1]['timestamp'].replace('Z', ''))
+             retry_count = recent_errors[-1].get('retry_count', 0)
+             wait_time = min(2 ** retry_count, 300)
+             next_retry = (last_error_time + timedelta(seconds=wait_time)).isoformat()
+         
+         # æ„å»ºæ€§èƒ½æŒ‡æ ‡
+         performance_metrics = {
+             'avg_response_time': getattr(crawler, 'avg_response_time', 0),
+             'success_rate': getattr(crawler, 'success_rate', 0),
+             'items_per_minute': getattr(crawler, 'items_per_minute', 0),
+             'last_performance_check': datetime.now().isoformat()
+         }
+         
+         # è·å–å½“å‰å‚æ•°
+         current_params = {
+             'delay': getattr(crawler, 'crawler_delay', getattr(crawler, 'delay', 1)),
+             'timeout': getattr(crawler, 'timeout', 30),
+             'concurrent': getattr(crawler, 'max_concurrent', 1),
+             'user_agent': getattr(crawler, 'user_agent', ''),
+         }
+         
+         return CrawlerStatus(
+             id=crawler_id,
+             name=crawler_info.get('name', crawler_id),
+             status=crawler_info.get('status', 'stopped'),
+             last_run=crawler_info.get('last_run'),
+             last_error=last_error,
+             next_retry=next_retry,
+             success_count=crawler_info.get('success_count', 0),
+             error_count=len([e for e in _error_history if e['crawler_id'] == crawler_id]),
+             current_params=current_params,
+             performance_metrics=performance_metrics
+         )
+         
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"è·å–çˆ¬è™«çŠ¶æ€å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
+         return CrawlerStatus(
+             id=crawler_id,
+             name=crawler_id,
+             status='error',
+             last_error=str(e),
+             current_params={},
+             performance_metrics={}
+         )
+ 
+ 
+ # æ³¨å†Œè“å›¾çš„å‡½æ•°
+ def register_crawler_control_routes(app):
+     """æ³¨å†Œçˆ¬è™«æ§åˆ¶è·¯ç”±"""
+     app.register_blueprint(crawler_control_bp)
+     logger.info("çˆ¬è™«æ§åˆ¶APIè·¯ç”±å·²æ³¨å†Œ") 
```

## ğŸ“Š Phase 3: æ•°æ®åˆ†æAPIï¼ˆä¼˜å…ˆçº§é«˜ï¼‰

è®©æˆ‘ç›´æ¥åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„æ•°æ®åˆ†æAPIæ–‡ä»¶ï¼š

```diff
+ #!/usr/bin/env python3
+ # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
+ """
+ æ•°æ®åˆ†æAPI - EChartsä»ªè¡¨ç›˜ã€æŠ¥è¡¨ç”Ÿæˆå™¨ã€å¯¼å‡ºå¼•æ“
+ æ”¯æŒå®æ—¶æ•°æ®åˆ†æã€å¤šç»´åº¦ç»Ÿè®¡ã€æ•°æ®å¯¼å‡º
+ """
+ 
+ import json
+ import csv
+ import io
+ import sqlite3
+ from datetime import datetime, timedelta
+ from typing import Dict, List, Optional, Any, Tuple
+ from flask import Blueprint, request, jsonify, Response
+ from dataclasses import dataclass, asdict
+ from collections import defaultdict
+ import tempfile
+ import os
+ 
+ from backend.newslook.core.config_manager import get_config
+ from backend.newslook.core.logger_manager import get_logger
+ 
+ # åˆ›å»ºè“å›¾
+ analytics_bp = Blueprint('analytics', __name__, url_prefix='/api/v1/analytics')
+ 
+ logger = get_logger(__name__)
+ config = get_config()
+ 
+ def get_database_connection() -> sqlite3.Connection:
+     """è·å–æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥"""
+     try:
+         from backend.newslook.config import get_unified_db_path
+         db_path = get_unified_db_path()
+         
+         conn = sqlite3.connect(db_path, timeout=30)
+         conn.row_factory = sqlite3.Row  # è¿”å›å­—å…¸æ ¼å¼
+         return conn
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"è·å–æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
+         raise
+ 
+ def safe_query(query: str, params: Tuple = ()) -> List[Dict]:
+     """å®‰å…¨æŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ®åº“"""
+     try:
+         with get_database_connection() as conn:
+             cursor = conn.cursor()
+             cursor.execute(query, params)
+             rows = cursor.fetchall()
+             return [dict(row) for row in rows]
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"æ•°æ®åº“æŸ¥è¯¢å¤±è´¥: {query}, é”™è¯¯: {str(e)}")
+         return []
+ 
+ @analytics_bp.route('/overview', methods=['GET'])
+ def get_analytics_overview():
+     """è·å–åˆ†ææ¦‚è§ˆ"""
+     try:
+         start_date = request.args.get('start_date', (datetime.now() - timedelta(days=30)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d'))
+         end_date = request.args.get('end_date', datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d'))
+         
+         # åŸºç¡€ç»Ÿè®¡
+         total_news_query = "SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM news WHERE publish_time BETWEEN ? AND ?"
+         total_result = safe_query(total_news_query, (start_date, end_date))
+         total_news = total_result[0]['count'] if total_result else 0
+         
+         # ä»Šæ—¥æ–°é—»
+         today = datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d')
+         today_news_query = "SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM news WHERE DATE(publish_time) = ?"
+         today_result = safe_query(today_news_query, (today,))
+         today_news = today_result[0]['count'] if today_result else 0
+         
+         # æ¥æºç»Ÿè®¡
+         sources_query = "SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT source) as count FROM news WHERE publish_time BETWEEN ? AND ?"
+         sources_result = safe_query(sources_query, (start_date, end_date))
+         sources_count = sources_result[0]['count'] if sources_result else 0
+         
+         # è¶‹åŠ¿æ•°æ®
+         trend_query = """
+             SELECT 
+                 DATE(publish_time) as date,
+                 COUNT(*) as count
+             FROM news 
+             WHERE publish_time >= DATE('now', '-7 days')
+             GROUP BY DATE(publish_time)
+             ORDER BY date
+         """
+         trend_data = safe_query(trend_query)
+         
+         # æ¥æºåˆ†å¸ƒ
+         source_query = """
+             SELECT 
+                 source,
+                 COUNT(*) as count
+             FROM news 
+             WHERE publish_time BETWEEN ? AND ?
+             GROUP BY source
+             ORDER BY count DESC
+             LIMIT 10
+         """
+         source_distribution = safe_query(source_query, (start_date, end_date))
+         
+         return {
+             'success': True,
+             'data': {
+                 'summary': {
+                     'total_news': total_news,
+                     'today_news': today_news,
+                     'sources_count': sources_count
+                 },
+                 'charts': {
+                     'trend': trend_data,
+                     'source_distribution': source_distribution
+                 }
+             },
+             'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat()
+         }
+         
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"è·å–åˆ†ææ¦‚è§ˆå¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
+         return {'error': str(e), 'success': False}, 500
+ 
+ @analytics_bp.route('/echarts/data', methods=['GET'])
+ def get_echarts_data():
+     """è·å–EChartså›¾è¡¨æ•°æ®"""
+     try:
+         chart_type = request.args.get('type', 'overview')
+         start_date = request.args.get('start_date', (datetime.now() - timedelta(days=30)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d'))
+         end_date = request.args.get('end_date', datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d'))
+         
+         chart_data = {}
+         
+         if chart_type == 'trend':
+             # è¶‹åŠ¿å›¾æ•°æ®
+             trend_query = """
+                 SELECT 
+                     DATE(publish_time) as date,
+                     COUNT(*) as count,
+                     source
+                 FROM news 
+                 WHERE publish_time BETWEEN ? AND ?
+                 GROUP BY DATE(publish_time), source
+                 ORDER BY date, source
+             """
+             trend_data = safe_query(trend_query, (start_date, end_date))
+             
+             # è½¬æ¢ä¸ºEChartsæ ¼å¼
+             dates = sorted(list(set([item['date'] for item in trend_data])))
+             sources = sorted(list(set([item['source'] for item in trend_data])))
+             
+             series_data = {}
+             for source in sources:
+                 series_data[source] = []
+                 for date in dates:
+                     count = next((item['count'] for item in trend_data 
+                                 if item['date'] == date and item['source'] == source), 0)
+                     series_data[source].append(count)
+             
+             chart_data = {
+                 'title': 'æ–°é—»å‘å¸ƒè¶‹åŠ¿',
+                 'xAxis': dates,
+                 'series': [
+                     {
+                         'name': source,
+                         'type': 'line',
+                         'data': data,
+                         'smooth': True
+                     }
+                     for source, data in series_data.items()
+                 ]
+             }
+         
+         elif chart_type == 'source':
+             # æ¥æºåˆ†å¸ƒé¥¼å›¾
+             source_query = """
+                 SELECT 
+                     source as name,
+                     COUNT(*) as value
+                 FROM news 
+                 WHERE publish_time BETWEEN ? AND ?
+                 GROUP BY source
+                 ORDER BY value DESC
+             """
+             source_data = safe_query(source_query, (start_date, end_date))
+             
+             chart_data = {
+                 'title': 'æ–°é—»æ¥æºåˆ†å¸ƒ',
+                 'series': [{
+                     'name': 'æ–°é—»æ•°é‡',
+                     'type': 'pie',
+                     'radius': ['50%', '70%'],
+                     'data': source_data
+                 }]
+             }
+         
+         return {
+             'success': True,
+             'data': chart_data,
+             'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat()
+         }
+         
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"è·å–EChartsæ•°æ®å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
+         return {'error': str(e), 'success': False}, 500
+ 
+ @analytics_bp.route('/export', methods=['POST'])
+ def export_data():
+     """æ•°æ®å¯¼å‡ºæ¥å£"""
+     try:
+         data = request.get_json() or {}
+         
+         export_type = data.get('type', 'news')
+         format_type = data.get('format', 'csv')
+         filters = data.get('filters', {})
+         
+         start_date = filters.get('start_date', (datetime.now() - timedelta(days=7)).strftime('%Y-%m-%d'))
+         end_date = filters.get('end_date', datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d'))
+         limit = min(filters.get('limit', 1000), 10000)
+         
+         # æ„å»ºæŸ¥è¯¢
+         if export_type == 'news':
+             query = "SELECT * FROM news WHERE publish_time BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY publish_time DESC LIMIT ?"
+             params = (start_date, end_date, limit)
+         else:
+             return {'error': f'ä¸æ”¯æŒçš„å¯¼å‡ºç±»å‹: {export_type}', 'success': False}, 400
+         
+         # æŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ®
+         export_data = safe_query(query, params)
+         
+         if not export_data:
+             return {'error': 'æ²¡æœ‰æ‰¾åˆ°ç¬¦åˆæ¡ä»¶çš„æ•°æ®', 'success': False}, 404
+         
+         # æ ¹æ®æ ¼å¼å¯¼å‡º
+         if format_type == 'json':
+             return {
+                 'success': True,
+                 'data': export_data,
+                 'count': len(export_data),
+                 'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat()
+             }
+             
+         elif format_type == 'csv':
+             output = io.StringIO()
+             writer = csv.DictWriter(output, fieldnames=export_data[0].keys())
+             writer.writeheader()
+             writer.writerows(export_data)
+             
+             output.seek(0)
+             
+             return Response(
+                 output.getvalue(),
+                 mimetype='text/csv',
+                 headers={
+                     'Content-Disposition': f'attachment; filename=newsLook_{export_type}_{datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")}.csv'
+                 }
+             )
+             
+         else:
+             return {'error': f'ä¸æ”¯æŒçš„å¯¼å‡ºæ ¼å¼: {format_type}', 'success': False}, 400
+             
+     except Exception as e:
+         logger.error(f"æ•°æ®å¯¼å‡ºå¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
+         return {'error': str(e), 'success': False}, 500
+ 
+ # æ³¨å†Œè“å›¾çš„å‡½æ•°
+ def register_analytics_routes(app):
+     """æ³¨å†Œæ•°æ®åˆ†æè·¯ç”±"""
+     app.register_blueprint(analytics_bp)
+     logger.info("æ•°æ®åˆ†æAPIè·¯ç”±å·²æ³¨å†Œ") 
```

å¤ªå¥½äº†ï¼ç°åœ¨è®©æˆ‘æ›´æ–°ä¸»åº”ç”¨æ–‡ä»¶ä»¥æ³¨å†Œè¿™äº›æ–°çš„APIè·¯ç”±ï¼š

```diff
+       <div class="footer-info">
+         <span>å…± {{ filteredDataCount }} æ¡è®°å½•</span>
+         <span v-if="selectedRows.length > 0">ï¼Œå·²é€‰æ‹© {{ selectedRows.length }} æ¡</span>
+       </div>
+       
+       <!-- æ‰¹é‡æ“ä½œ -->
+       <div v-if="selectedRows.length > 0" class="batch-actions">
+         <el-button-group size="small">
+           <el-button @click="clearSelection">æ¸…é™¤é€‰æ‹©</el-button>
+           <el-button @click="selectAll">å…¨é€‰</el-button>
+           <el-button @click="invertSelection">åé€‰</el-button>
+         </el-button-group>
+         <slot name="batch-actions" :selected-rows="selectedRows" />
+       </div>
+     </div>
+   </div>
+ </template>
+ 
+ <script setup>
+ import { ref, reactive, computed, watch, onMounted, onUnmounted, nextTick } from 'vue'
+ import { Sort, Filter } from '@element-plus/icons-vue'
+ 
+ // Propså®šä¹‰
+ const props = defineProps({
+   // æ•°æ®æº
+   data: {
+     type: Array,
+     default: () => []
+   },
+   
+   // åˆ—é…ç½®
+   columns: {
+     type: Array,
+     required: true
+   },
+   
+   // è¡¨æ ¼é«˜åº¦
+   height: {
+     type: Number,
+     default: 400
+   },
+   
+   // è¡Œé«˜
+   rowHeight: {
+     type: Number,
+     default: 48
+   },
+   
+   // ç¼“å†²åŒºè¡Œæ•°
+   bufferSize: {
+     type: Number,
+     default: 10
+   },
+   
+   // æ˜¯å¦å¯é€‰æ‹©
+   selectable: {
+     type: Boolean,
+     default: false
+   },
+   
+   // é€‰æ‹©åˆ—å®½åº¦
+   selectionWidth: {
+     type: Number,
+     default: 50
+   },
+   
+   // è¡Œé”®å€¼å­—æ®µ
+   rowKey: {
+     type: String,
+     default: 'id'
+   },
+   
+   // æ˜¯å¦æ˜¾ç¤ºåŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€
+   loading: {
+     type: Boolean,
+     default: false
+   }
+ })
+ 
+ // Emitså®šä¹‰
+ const emit = defineEmits([
+   'row-click',
+   'selection-change',
+   'sort-change',
+   'filter-change'
+ ])
+ 
+ // å“åº”å¼æ•°æ®
+ const tableContainer = ref(null)
+ const scrollContainer = ref(null)
+ const scrollTop = ref(0)
+ const hoverIndex = ref(-1)
+ 
+ // æ’åºçŠ¶æ€
+ const sortState = reactive({
+   key: '',
+   order: '' // 'asc' | 'desc' | ''
+ })
+ 
+ // ç­›é€‰çŠ¶æ€
+ const filters = reactive({})
+ const filterValues = reactive({})
+ 
+ // é€‰æ‹©çŠ¶æ€
+ const selectedRows = ref([])
+ 
+ // è®¡ç®—å±æ€§
+ const totalWidth = computed(() => {
+   let width = props.selectable ? props.selectionWidth : 0
+   return width + props.columns.reduce((sum, col) => sum + (col.width || 120), 0)
+ })
+ 
+ const filteredData = computed(() => {
+   let result = [...props.data]
+   
+   // åº”ç”¨ç­›é€‰
+   Object.keys(filters).forEach(key => {
+     if (filters[key]) {
+       const filterValue = filters[key].toLowerCase()
+       result = result.filter(row => {
+         const cellValue = getCellValue(row, key)
+         return String(cellValue).toLowerCase().includes(filterValue)
+       })
+     }
+   })
+   
+   // åº”ç”¨æ’åº
+   if (sortState.key && sortState.order) {
+     result.sort((a, b) => {
+       const aVal = getCellValue(a, sortState.key)
+       const bVal = getCellValue(b, sortState.key)
+       
+       let comparison = 0
+       if (aVal < bVal) comparison = -1
+       if (aVal > bVal) comparison = 1
+       
+       return sortState.order === 'desc' ? -comparison : comparison
+     })
+   }
+   
+   return result
+ })
+ 
+ const filteredDataCount = computed(() => filteredData.value.length)
+ 
+ const totalHeight = computed(() => filteredData.value.length * props.rowHeight)
+ 
+ const visibleCount = computed(() => Math.ceil(props.height / props.rowHeight) + props.bufferSize * 2)
+ 
+ const startIndex = computed(() => {
+   const index = Math.floor(scrollTop.value / props.rowHeight) - props.bufferSize
+   return Math.max(0, index)
+ })
+ 
+ const endIndex = computed(() => {
+   const index = startIndex.value + visibleCount.value
+   return Math.min(filteredData.value.length, index)
+ })
+ 
+ const visibleData = computed(() => {
+   return filteredData.value.slice(startIndex.value, endIndex.value)
+ })
+ 
+ const offsetY = computed(() => startIndex.value * props.rowHeight)
+ 
+ // æ–¹æ³•
+ const handleScroll = (event) => {
+   scrollTop.value = event.target.scrollTop
+ }
+ 
+ const handleSort = (column) => {
+   if (!column.sortable) return
+   
+   if (sortState.key === column.key) {
+     // åˆ‡æ¢æ’åºé¡ºåº: asc -> desc -> ''
+     if (sortState.order === 'asc') {
+       sortState.order = 'desc'
+     } else if (sortState.order === 'desc') {
+       sortState.key = ''
+       sortState.order = ''
+     } else {
+       sortState.order = 'asc'
+     }
+   } else {
+     sortState.key = column.key
+     sortState.order = 'asc'
+   }
+   
+   emit('sort-change', { key: sortState.key, order: sortState.order })
+ }
+ 
+ const getSortClass = (key) => {
+   if (sortState.key !== key) return ''
+   return `sort-${sortState.order}`
+ }
+ 
+ const handleFilter = (key) => {
+   // å®æ—¶ç­›é€‰ï¼ˆé˜²æŠ–å¤„ç†åœ¨çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶ä¸­å®ç°ï¼‰
+   filters[key] = filterValues[key]
+   emit('filter-change', { key, value: filters[key] })
+ }
+ 
+ const applyFilter = (key) => {
+   filters[key] = filterValues[key]
+   emit('filter-change', { key, value: filters[key] })
+ }
+ 
+ const clearFilter = (key) => {
+   filterValues[key] = ''
+   filters[key] = ''
+   emit('filter-change', { key, value: '' })
+ }
+ 
+ const handleRowClick = (row, index) => {
+   emit('row-click', { row, index })
+ }
+ 
+ const handleRowSelect = (row, index) => {
+   const key = getRowKey(row, index)
+   const selectedIndex = selectedRows.value.indexOf(key)
+   
+   if (selectedIndex > -1) {
+     selectedRows.value.splice(selectedIndex, 1)
+   } else {
+     selectedRows.value.push(key)
+   }
+   
+   emit('selection-change', selectedRows.value)
+ }
+ 
+ const clearSelection = () => {
+   selectedRows.value = []
+   emit('selection-change', [])
+ }
+ 
+ const selectAll = () => {
+   selectedRows.value = filteredData.value.map((row, index) => getRowKey(row, index))
+   emit('selection-change', selectedRows.value)
+ }
+ 
+ const invertSelection = () => {
+   const allKeys = filteredData.value.map((row, index) => getRowKey(row, index))
+   selectedRows.value = allKeys.filter(key => !selectedRows.value.includes(key))
+   emit('selection-change', selectedRows.value)
+ }
+ 
+ const getRowKey = (row, index) => {
+   return row[props.rowKey] || index
+ }
+ 
+ const getCellValue = (row, key) => {
+   return key.split('.').reduce((obj, k) => obj?.[k], row) || ''
+ }
+ 
+ const formatCellValue = (value, column) => {
+   if (column.formatter && typeof column.formatter === 'function') {
+     return column.formatter(value)
+   }
+   return value
+ }
+ 
+ // ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸ
+ onMounted(() => {
+   // åˆå§‹åŒ–æ—¶æ»šåŠ¨åˆ°é¡¶éƒ¨
+   nextTick(() => {
+     if (scrollContainer.value) {
+       scrollContainer.value.scrollTop = 0
+     }
+   })
+ })
+ 
+ // ç›‘å¬æ•°æ®å˜åŒ–ï¼Œé‡ç½®æ»šåŠ¨ä½ç½®
+ watch(() => props.data, () => {
+   scrollTop.value = 0
+   if (scrollContainer.value) {
+     scrollContainer.value.scrollTop = 0
+   }
+ })
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style scoped>
+ .virtual-scroll-table {
+   border: 1px solid var(--el-border-color);

+   overflow: hidden;
```

```diff

+ import { ref, onMounted, onUnmounted } from 'vue'
+ import { ElMessage } from 'element-plus'
+ 
+ // æ“ä½œå†å²æ ˆ
+ class ActionHistory {
+   constructor(maxSize = 50) {
+     this.undoStack = []
+     this.redoStack = []
+     this.maxSize = maxSize
+   }
+ 
+   // æ·»åŠ æ–°æ“ä½œ
+   push(action) {
+     // æ¸…ç©ºé‡åšæ ˆ
+     this.redoStack = []
+     
+     // æ·»åŠ åˆ°æ’¤é”€æ ˆ
+     this.undoStack.push(action)
+     
+     // é™åˆ¶æ ˆå¤§å°
+     if (this.undoStack.length > this.maxSize) {
+       this.undoStack.shift()
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   // æ’¤é”€æ“ä½œ
+   undo() {
+     if (this.undoStack.length === 0) {
+       return null
+     }
+ 
+     const action = this.undoStack.pop()
+     this.redoStack.push(action)
+     return action
+   }
+ 
+   // é‡åšæ“ä½œ
+   redo() {
+     if (this.redoStack.length === 0) {
+       return null
+     }
+ 
+     const action = this.redoStack.pop()
+     this.undoStack.push(action)
+     return action
+   }
+ 
+   // æ¸…ç©ºå†å²
+   clear() {
+     this.undoStack = []
+     this.redoStack = []
+   }
+ 
+   // è·å–çŠ¶æ€
+   get canUndo() {
+     return this.undoStack.length > 0
+   }
+ 
+   get canRedo() {
+     return this.redoStack.length > 0
+   }
+ 
+   get undoCount() {
+     return this.undoStack.length
+   }
+ 
+   get redoCount() {
+     return this.redoStack.length
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // å¿«æ·é”®é…ç½®
+ const defaultShortcuts = {
+   // ç³»ç»Ÿå¿«æ·é”®
+   'ctrl+z': 'undo',
+   'ctrl+y': 'redo',
+   'ctrl+shift+z': 'redo',
+   'ctrl+r': 'refresh',
+   'f5': 'refresh',
+   'ctrl+s': 'save',
+   'ctrl+f': 'search',
+   'esc': 'escape',
+   
+   // å¯¼èˆªå¿«æ·é”®
+   'ctrl+1': 'goToTab1',
+   'ctrl+2': 'goToTab2',
+   'ctrl+3': 'goToTab3',
+   'ctrl+4': 'goToTab4',
+   'ctrl+5': 'goToTab5',
+   
+   // åŠŸèƒ½å¿«æ·é”®
+   'ctrl+shift+d': 'toggleDarkMode',
+   'ctrl+shift+f': 'toggleFullscreen',
+   'ctrl+shift+r': 'hardRefresh',
+   'ctrl+shift+c': 'clearCache',
+   
+   // è¡¨æ ¼å¿«æ·é”®
+   'ctrl+a': 'selectAll',
+   'delete': 'deleteSelected',
+   'ctrl+d': 'duplicateSelected',
+   'ctrl+e': 'exportData',
+   
+   // çˆ¬è™«æ§åˆ¶å¿«æ·é”®
+   'ctrl+shift+s': 'startAllCrawlers',
+   'ctrl+shift+p': 'stopAllCrawlers',
+   'ctrl+shift+t': 'toggleAllCrawlers',
+   
+   // æ•°æ®å¿«æ·é”®
+   'ctrl+shift+e': 'exportAllData',
+   'ctrl+shift+i': 'importData',
+   'ctrl+shift+b': 'backup'
+ }
+ 
+ // å¿«æ·é”®å¤„ç†å™¨
+ export function useKeyboardShortcuts(customShortcuts = {}, options = {}) {
+   const shortcuts = { ...defaultShortcuts, ...customShortcuts }
+   const actionHistory = new ActionHistory(options.maxHistorySize || 50)
+   const isEnabled = ref(true)
+   const listeners = ref(new Map())
+ 
+   // æ³¨å†Œå¿«æ·é”®ç›‘å¬å™¨
+   const registerShortcut = (key, callback) => {
+     if (typeof callback === 'string') {
+       // å¦‚æœæ˜¯å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œåˆ™æŸ¥æ‰¾é¢„å®šä¹‰çš„å›è°ƒ
+       const predefinedCallback = listeners.value.get(callback)
+       if (predefinedCallback) {
+         listeners.value.set(key, predefinedCallback)
+       }
+     } else if (typeof callback === 'function') {
+       listeners.value.set(key, callback)
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   // æ³¨å†Œé¢„å®šä¹‰çš„å¤„ç†å™¨
+   const registerHandler = (name, callback) => {
+     listeners.value.set(name, callback)
+   }
+ 
+   // é”®ç›˜äº‹ä»¶å¤„ç†
+   const handleKeyDown = (event) => {
+     if (!isEnabled.value) return
+ 
+     // æ„å»ºå¿«æ·é”®å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
+     let keyString = ''
+     if (event.ctrlKey) keyString += 'ctrl+'
+     if (event.shiftKey) keyString += 'shift+'
+     if (event.altKey) keyString += 'alt+'
+     if (event.metaKey) keyString += 'cmd+'
+ 
+     // ç‰¹æ®Šé”®å¤„ç†
+     const specialKeys = {
+       'Escape': 'esc',
+       'F5': 'f5',
+       'Delete': 'delete',
+       'Backspace': 'backspace',
+       'Enter': 'enter',
+       'Tab': 'tab',
+       'Space': 'space',
+       'ArrowUp': 'up',
+       'ArrowDown': 'down',
+       'ArrowLeft': 'left',
+       'ArrowRight': 'right'
+     }
+ 
+     const key = specialKeys[event.key] || event.key.toLowerCase()
+     keyString += key
+ 
+     // æŸ¥æ‰¾å¹¶æ‰§è¡Œå›è°ƒ
+     const shortcutAction = shortcuts[keyString]
+     if (shortcutAction) {
+       const callback = listeners.value.get(shortcutAction) || listeners.value.get(keyString)
+       if (callback) {
+         event.preventDefault()
+         event.stopPropagation()
+         
+         try {
+           callback(event)
+           // æ˜¾ç¤ºå¿«æ·é”®æç¤º
+           if (options.showTooltips) {
+             ElMessage({
+               message: `å¿«æ·é”®: ${keyString.toUpperCase()}`,
+               type: 'info',
+               duration: 1000,
+               showClose: false
+             })
+           }
+         } catch (error) {
+           console.error('å¿«æ·é”®æ‰§è¡Œé”™è¯¯:', error)
+           ElMessage.error('æ“ä½œæ‰§è¡Œå¤±è´¥')
+         }
+       }
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   // æ·»åŠ æ“ä½œåˆ°å†å²
+   const addAction = (action) => {
+     actionHistory.push(action)
+   }
+ 
+   // æ’¤é”€æ“ä½œ
+   const undo = () => {
+     const action = actionHistory.undo()
+     if (action && action.undo && typeof action.undo === 'function') {
+       try {
+         action.undo()
+         ElMessage.success('æ’¤é”€æˆåŠŸ')
+         return true
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('æ’¤é”€æ“ä½œå¤±è´¥:', error)
+         ElMessage.error('æ’¤é”€å¤±è´¥')
+         return false
+       }
+     } else {
+       ElMessage.warning('æ²¡æœ‰å¯æ’¤é”€çš„æ“ä½œ')
+       return false
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   // é‡åšæ“ä½œ
+   const redo = () => {
+     const action = actionHistory.redo()
+     if (action && action.redo && typeof action.redo === 'function') {
+       try {
+         action.redo()
+         ElMessage.success('é‡åšæˆåŠŸ')
+         return true
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('é‡åšæ“ä½œå¤±è´¥:', error)
+         ElMessage.error('é‡åšå¤±è´¥')
+         return false
+       }
+     } else {
+       ElMessage.warning('æ²¡æœ‰å¯é‡åšçš„æ“ä½œ')
+       return false
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   // æ¸…ç©ºå†å²
+   const clearHistory = () => {
+     actionHistory.clear()
+     ElMessage.info('æ“ä½œå†å²å·²æ¸…ç©º')
+   }
+ 
+   // è·å–å†å²çŠ¶æ€
+   const getHistoryState = () => {
+     return {
+       canUndo: actionHistory.canUndo,
+       canRedo: actionHistory.canRedo,
+       undoCount: actionHistory.undoCount,
+       redoCount: actionHistory.redoCount
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   // å¯ç”¨/ç¦ç”¨å¿«æ·é”®
+   const setEnabled = (enabled) => {
+     isEnabled.value = enabled
+   }
+ 
+   // è·å–æ‰€æœ‰å¿«æ·é”®
+   const getAllShortcuts = () => {
+     return Object.entries(shortcuts).map(([key, action]) => ({
+       key: key.toUpperCase(),
+       action,
+       description: getShortcutDescription(action)
+     }))
+   }
+ 
+   // è·å–å¿«æ·é”®æè¿°
+   const getShortcutDescription = (action) => {
+     const descriptions = {
+       'undo': 'æ’¤é”€',
+       'redo': 'é‡åš',
+       'refresh': 'åˆ·æ–°',
+       'save': 'ä¿å­˜',
+       'search': 'æœç´¢',
+       'escape': 'å–æ¶ˆ/å…³é—­',
+       'goToTab1': 'åˆ‡æ¢åˆ°ç¬¬1ä¸ªæ ‡ç­¾',
+       'goToTab2': 'åˆ‡æ¢åˆ°ç¬¬2ä¸ªæ ‡ç­¾',
+       'goToTab3': 'åˆ‡æ¢åˆ°ç¬¬3ä¸ªæ ‡ç­¾',
+       'goToTab4': 'åˆ‡æ¢åˆ°ç¬¬4ä¸ªæ ‡ç­¾',
+       'goToTab5': 'åˆ‡æ¢åˆ°ç¬¬5ä¸ªæ ‡ç­¾',
+       'toggleDarkMode': 'åˆ‡æ¢æš—è‰²æ¨¡å¼',
+       'toggleFullscreen': 'åˆ‡æ¢å…¨å±',
+       'hardRefresh': 'å¼ºåˆ¶åˆ·æ–°',
+       'clearCache': 'æ¸…é™¤ç¼“å­˜',
+       'selectAll': 'å…¨é€‰',
+       'deleteSelected': 'åˆ é™¤é€‰ä¸­é¡¹',
+       'duplicateSelected': 'å¤åˆ¶é€‰ä¸­é¡¹',
+       'exportData': 'å¯¼å‡ºæ•°æ®',
+       'startAllCrawlers': 'å¯åŠ¨æ‰€æœ‰çˆ¬è™«',
+       'stopAllCrawlers': 'åœæ­¢æ‰€æœ‰çˆ¬è™«',
+       'toggleAllCrawlers': 'åˆ‡æ¢æ‰€æœ‰çˆ¬è™«çŠ¶æ€',
+       'exportAllData': 'å¯¼å‡ºæ‰€æœ‰æ•°æ®',
+       'importData': 'å¯¼å…¥æ•°æ®',
+       'backup': 'å¤‡ä»½æ•°æ®'
+     }
+     return descriptions[action] || action
+   }
+ 
+   // æ³¨å†Œé»˜è®¤å¤„ç†å™¨
+   const registerDefaultHandlers = () => {
+     // æ’¤é”€/é‡åš
+     registerHandler('undo', undo)
+     registerHandler('redo', redo)
+     
+     // åˆ·æ–°
+     registerHandler('refresh', () => {
+       window.location.reload()
+     })
+     
+     // ç¡¬åˆ·æ–°
+     registerHandler('hardRefresh', () => {
+       window.location.reload(true)
+     })
+     
+     // é˜»æ­¢é»˜è®¤ä¿å­˜
+     registerHandler('save', (event) => {
+       event.preventDefault()
+       ElMessage.info('è¯·ä½¿ç”¨ç•Œé¢ä¸­çš„ä¿å­˜æŒ‰é’®')
+     })
+     
+     // æœç´¢
+     registerHandler('search', () => {
+       const searchInput = document.querySelector('input[type="search"], .search-input input')
+       if (searchInput) {
+         searchInput.focus()
+       }
+     })
+     
+     // ESCé”®å¤„ç†
+     registerHandler('escape', () => {
+       // å…³é—­æ‰€æœ‰æ‰“å¼€çš„å¯¹è¯æ¡†
+       const dialogs = document.querySelectorAll('.el-dialog__wrapper')
+       dialogs.forEach(dialog => {
+         const closeBtn = dialog.querySelector('.el-dialog__headerbtn')
+         if (closeBtn) closeBtn.click()
+       })
+       
+       // æ¸…é™¤é€‰æ‹©
+       const selection = window.getSelection()
+       if (selection) {
+         selection.removeAllRanges()
+       }
+     })
+   }
+ 
+   // ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸé’©å­
+   onMounted(() => {
+     registerDefaultHandlers()
+     document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown)
+   })
+ 
+   onUnmounted(() => {
+     document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown)
+   })
+ 
+   return {
+     // çŠ¶æ€
+     isEnabled,
+     
+     // æ–¹æ³•
+     registerShortcut,
+     registerHandler,
+     addAction,
+     undo,
+     redo,
+     clearHistory,
+     getHistoryState,
+     setEnabled,
+     getAllShortcuts,
+     
+     // å†å²çŠ¶æ€
+     canUndo: () => actionHistory.canUndo,
+     canRedo: () => actionHistory.canRedo,
+     undoCount: () => actionHistory.undoCount,
+     redoCount: () => actionHistory.redoCount
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // åˆ›å»ºæ ‡å‡†æ“ä½œå¯¹è±¡çš„è¾…åŠ©å‡½æ•°
+ export function createAction(name, redoFn, undoFn, data = {}) {
+   return {
+     name,
+     timestamp: Date.now(),
+     data,
+     redo: redoFn,
+     undo: undoFn
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // æ‰¹é‡æ“ä½œè¾…åŠ©å‡½æ•°
+ export function createBatchAction(name, actions) {
+   return {
+     name,
+     timestamp: Date.now(),
+     actions,
+     redo: () => {
+       actions.forEach(action => {
+         if (action.redo) action.redo()
+       })
+     },
+     undo: () => {
+       // é€†åºæ‰§è¡Œæ’¤é”€
+       actions.reverse().forEach(action => {
+         if (action.undo) action.undo()
+       })
+     }
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ export default useKeyboardShortcuts 
```

ç°åœ¨è®©æˆ‘åˆ›å»ºService Workerç¼“å­˜ç­–ç•¥ï¼š

---

```diff
- 
+ // Service Worker for NewsLook Frontend
+ // ç‰ˆæœ¬å·ï¼Œç”¨äºç¼“å­˜æ›´æ–°
+ const CACHE_VERSION = 'v1.0.0'
+ const CACHE_NAME = `newslook-cache-${CACHE_VERSION}`
+ 
+ // ç¼“å­˜ç­–ç•¥é…ç½®
+ const CACHE_STRATEGIES = {
+   // é™æ€èµ„æºï¼šç¼“å­˜ä¼˜å…ˆ
+   STATIC: 'cache-first',
+   // APIæ•°æ®ï¼šç½‘ç»œä¼˜å…ˆï¼Œå¤±è´¥æ—¶ä½¿ç”¨ç¼“å­˜
+   API: 'network-first',
+   // å›¾ç‰‡ï¼šç¼“å­˜ä¼˜å…ˆï¼Œå¤±è´¥æ—¶ä»ç½‘ç»œè·å–
+   IMAGES: 'cache-first',
+   // HTMLï¼šç½‘ç»œä¼˜å…ˆ
+   HTML: 'network-first'
+ }
+ 
+ // éœ€è¦ç¼“å­˜çš„é™æ€èµ„æº
+ const STATIC_CACHE_URLS = [
+   '/',
+   '/index.html',
+   '/manifest.json',
+   // CSSå’ŒJSæ–‡ä»¶å°†åœ¨è¿è¡Œæ—¶åŠ¨æ€æ·»åŠ 
+ ]
+ 
+ // APIè·¯å¾„æ¨¡å¼
+ const API_PATTERNS = [
+   /^\/api\/v1\/analytics/,
+   /^\/api\/v1\/system/,
+   /^\/api\/v1\/crawlers/,
+   /^\/api\/stats/,
+   /^\/api\/news/
+ ]
+ 
+ // å›¾ç‰‡è·¯å¾„æ¨¡å¼
+ const IMAGE_PATTERNS = [
+   /\.(png|jpg|jpeg|gif|webp|svg|ico)$/i,
+   /^\/images\//,
+   /^\/assets\/images\//
+ ]
+ 
+ // ç¼“å­˜æ—¶é—´é…ç½® (æ¯«ç§’)
+ const CACHE_DURATIONS = {
+   STATIC: 7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000,    // 7å¤©
+   API: 5 * 60 * 1000,                  // 5åˆ†é’Ÿ
+   IMAGES: 30 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000,    // 30å¤©
+   HTML: 1 * 60 * 60 * 1000             // 1å°æ—¶
+ }
+ 
+ // Service Workerå®‰è£…äº‹ä»¶
+ self.addEventListener('install', event => {
+   console.log('Service Worker å®‰è£…ä¸­...')
+   
+   event.waitUntil(
+     caches.open(CACHE_NAME)
+       .then(cache => {
+         console.log('é¢„ç¼“å­˜é™æ€èµ„æº')
+         return cache.addAll(STATIC_CACHE_URLS)
+       })
+       .then(() => {
+         // å¼ºåˆ¶æ¿€æ´»æ–°çš„Service Worker
+         return self.skipWaiting()
+       })
+   )
+ })
+ 
+ // Service Workeræ¿€æ´»äº‹ä»¶
+ self.addEventListener('activate', event => {
+   console.log('Service Worker æ¿€æ´»ä¸­...')
+   
+   event.waitUntil(
+     caches.keys()
+       .then(cacheNames => {
+         // åˆ é™¤æ—§ç‰ˆæœ¬ç¼“å­˜
+         return Promise.all(
+           cacheNames
+             .filter(cacheName => cacheName.startsWith('newslook-cache-') && cacheName !== CACHE_NAME)
+             .map(cacheName => {
+               console.log('åˆ é™¤æ—§ç¼“å­˜:', cacheName)
+               return caches.delete(cacheName)
+             })
+         )
+       })
+       .then(() => {
+         // æ¥ç®¡æ‰€æœ‰å®¢æˆ·ç«¯
+         return self.clients.claim()
+       })
+   )
+ })
+ 
+ // ç½‘ç»œè¯·æ±‚æ‹¦æˆª
+ self.addEventListener('fetch', event => {
+   const request = event.request
+   const url = new URL(request.url)
+   
+   // åªå¤„ç†GETè¯·æ±‚
+   if (request.method !== 'GET') {
+     return
+   }
+   
+   // ç¡®å®šç¼“å­˜ç­–ç•¥
+   const strategy = determineStrategy(url.pathname, url.href)
+   
+   event.respondWith(
+     handleRequest(request, strategy)
+   )
+ })
+ 
+ // ç¡®å®šç¼“å­˜ç­–ç•¥
+ function determineStrategy(pathname, href) {
+   // APIè¯·æ±‚
+   if (API_PATTERNS.some(pattern => pattern.test(pathname))) {
+     return CACHE_STRATEGIES.API
+   }
+   
+   // å›¾ç‰‡èµ„æº
+   if (IMAGE_PATTERNS.some(pattern => pattern.test(pathname))) {
+     return CACHE_STRATEGIES.IMAGES
+   }
+   
+   // HTMLæ–‡ä»¶
+   if (pathname.endsWith('.html') || pathname === '/' || !pathname.includes('.')) {
+     return CACHE_STRATEGIES.HTML
+   }
+   
+   // é™æ€èµ„æºï¼ˆCSSã€JSç­‰ï¼‰
+   return CACHE_STRATEGIES.STATIC
+ }
+ 
+ // å¤„ç†è¯·æ±‚çš„ä¸»è¦å‡½æ•°
+ async function handleRequest(request, strategy) {
+   try {
+     switch (strategy) {
+       case CACHE_STRATEGIES.STATIC:
+         return await cacheFirst(request)
+       
+       case CACHE_STRATEGIES.API:
+         return await networkFirst(request)
+       
+       case CACHE_STRATEGIES.IMAGES:
+         return await cacheFirst(request)
+       
+       case CACHE_STRATEGIES.HTML:
+         return await networkFirst(request)
+       
+       default:
+         return await networkFirst(request)
+     }
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('è¯·æ±‚å¤„ç†å¤±è´¥:', error)
+     return await handleOffline(request)
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // ç¼“å­˜ä¼˜å…ˆç­–ç•¥
+ async function cacheFirst(request) {
+   const cache = await caches.open(CACHE_NAME)
+   const cachedResponse = await cache.match(request)
+   
+   if (cachedResponse && !isExpired(cachedResponse)) {
+     return cachedResponse
+   }
+   
+   try {
+     const networkResponse = await fetch(request)
+     
+     if (networkResponse.ok) {
+       // æ·»åŠ æ—¶é—´æˆ³ç”¨äºè¿‡æœŸæ£€æŸ¥
+       const responseToCache = networkResponse.clone()
+       addTimestamp(responseToCache)
+       cache.put(request, responseToCache)
+     }
+     
+     return networkResponse
+   } catch (error) {
+     // ç½‘ç»œå¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¿”å›ç¼“å­˜ï¼ˆå³ä½¿å·²è¿‡æœŸï¼‰
+     if (cachedResponse) {
+       return cachedResponse
+     }
+     throw error
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // ç½‘ç»œä¼˜å…ˆç­–ç•¥
+ async function networkFirst(request) {
+   try {
+     const networkResponse = await fetch(request)
+     
+     if (networkResponse.ok) {
+       const cache = await caches.open(CACHE_NAME)
+       const responseToCache = networkResponse.clone()
+       addTimestamp(responseToCache)
+       cache.put(request, responseToCache)
+     }
+     
+     return networkResponse
+   } catch (error) {
+     // ç½‘ç»œå¤±è´¥ï¼Œå°è¯•ä»ç¼“å­˜è·å–
+     const cache = await caches.open(CACHE_NAME)
+     const cachedResponse = await cache.match(request)
+     
+     if (cachedResponse) {
+       return cachedResponse
+     }
+     
+     throw error
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // æ·»åŠ æ—¶é—´æˆ³åˆ°å“åº”å¤´
+ function addTimestamp(response) {
+   if (response.headers) {
+     response.headers.set('sw-cached-at', Date.now().toString())
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // æ£€æŸ¥ç¼“å­˜æ˜¯å¦è¿‡æœŸ
+ function isExpired(response) {
+   const cachedAt = response.headers.get('sw-cached-at')
+   if (!cachedAt) return false
+   
+   const now = Date.now()
+   const cacheTime = parseInt(cachedAt)
+   const url = new URL(response.url)
+   
+   // æ ¹æ®èµ„æºç±»å‹ç¡®å®šè¿‡æœŸæ—¶é—´
+   let maxAge = CACHE_DURATIONS.STATIC
+   
+   if (API_PATTERNS.some(pattern => pattern.test(url.pathname))) {
+     maxAge = CACHE_DURATIONS.API
+   } else if (IMAGE_PATTERNS.some(pattern => pattern.test(url.pathname))) {
+     maxAge = CACHE_DURATIONS.IMAGES
+   } else if (url.pathname.endsWith('.html') || url.pathname === '/') {
+     maxAge = CACHE_DURATIONS.HTML
+   }
+   
+   return (now - cacheTime) > maxAge
+ }
+ 
+ // å¤„ç†ç¦»çº¿æƒ…å†µ
+ async function handleOffline(request) {
+   const url = new URL(request.url)
+   
+   // å¦‚æœæ˜¯å¯¼èˆªè¯·æ±‚ï¼Œè¿”å›ç¦»çº¿é¡µé¢
+   if (request.mode === 'navigate') {
+     return await caches.match('/') || new Response('ç¦»çº¿çŠ¶æ€', {
+       status: 200,
+       headers: { 'Content-Type': 'text/html' }
+     })
+   }
+   
+   // APIè¯·æ±‚å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¿”å›ç¦»çº¿æ•°æ®
+   if (API_PATTERNS.some(pattern => pattern.test(url.pathname))) {
+     return new Response(JSON.stringify({
+       success: false,
+       message: 'å½“å‰å¤„äºç¦»çº¿çŠ¶æ€',
+       offline: true,
+       data: null
+     }), {
+       status: 503,
+       headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }
+     })
+   }
+   
+   // å…¶ä»–è¯·æ±‚è¿”å›ç½‘ç»œé”™è¯¯
+   return new Response('ç½‘ç»œé”™è¯¯', {
+     status: 503,
+     statusText: 'Service Unavailable'
+   })
+ }
+ 
+ // æ¶ˆæ¯å¤„ç†
+ self.addEventListener('message', event => {
+   const { type, data } = event.data
+   
+   switch (type) {
+     case 'SKIP_WAITING':
+       self.skipWaiting()
+       break
+       
+     case 'GET_CACHE_INFO':
+       getCacheInfo().then(info => {
+         event.ports[0].postMessage(info)
+       })
+       break
+       
+     case 'CLEAR_CACHE':
+       clearCache(data?.pattern).then(result => {
+         event.ports[0].postMessage(result)
+       })
+       break
+       
+     case 'FORCE_REFRESH':
+       forceRefreshCache(data?.urls).then(result => {
+         event.ports[0].postMessage(result)
+       })
+       break
+   }
+ })
+ 
+ // è·å–ç¼“å­˜ä¿¡æ¯
+ async function getCacheInfo() {
+   const cache = await caches.open(CACHE_NAME)
+   const keys = await cache.keys()
+   
+   const info = {
+     version: CACHE_VERSION,
+     cacheName: CACHE_NAME,
+     totalItems: keys.length,
+     size: 0, // æ— æ³•å‡†ç¡®è®¡ç®—ï¼Œä½†å¯ä»¥ä¼°ç®—
+     items: []
+   }
+   
+   for (const request of keys) {
+     const response = await cache.match(request)
+     const cachedAt = response.headers.get('sw-cached-at')
+     const size = response.headers.get('content-length') || 0
+     
+     info.items.push({
+       url: request.url,
+       method: request.method,
+       cachedAt: cachedAt ? new Date(parseInt(cachedAt)).toISOString() : null,
+       size: parseInt(size),
+       expired: isExpired(response)
+     })
+     
+     info.size += parseInt(size)
+   }
+   
+   return info
+ }
+ 
+ // æ¸…é™¤ç¼“å­˜
+ async function clearCache(pattern) {
+   const cache = await caches.open(CACHE_NAME)
+   const keys = await cache.keys()
+   
+   let deletedCount = 0
+   
+   for (const request of keys) {
+     if (!pattern || new RegExp(pattern).test(request.url)) {
+       await cache.delete(request)
+       deletedCount++
+     }
+   }
+   
+   return {
+     success: true,
+     deletedCount,
+     message: `å·²æ¸…é™¤ ${deletedCount} ä¸ªç¼“å­˜é¡¹`
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // å¼ºåˆ¶åˆ·æ–°ç¼“å­˜
+ async function forceRefreshCache(urls = []) {
+   const cache = await caches.open(CACHE_NAME)
+   let refreshedCount = 0
+   
+   for (const url of urls) {
+     try {
+       const response = await fetch(url, { cache: 'no-cache' })
+       if (response.ok) {
+         const responseToCache = response.clone()
+         addTimestamp(responseToCache)
+         await cache.put(url, responseToCache)
+         refreshedCount++
+       }
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error(`ç¼“å­˜åˆ·æ–°å¤±è´¥: ${url}`, error)
+     }
+   }
+   
+   return {
+     success: true,
+     refreshedCount,
+     message: `å·²åˆ·æ–° ${refreshedCount} ä¸ªç¼“å­˜é¡¹`
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // åå°åŒæ­¥ï¼ˆå¦‚æœæ”¯æŒï¼‰
+ if ('sync' in self.registration) {
+   self.addEventListener('sync', event => {
+     if (event.tag === 'background-sync') {
+       event.waitUntil(doBackgroundSync())
+     }
+   })
+ }
+ 
+ // åå°åŒæ­¥å¤„ç†
+ async function doBackgroundSync() {
+   try {
+     // è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥æ‰§è¡Œä¸€äº›åå°åŒæ­¥ä»»åŠ¡
+     // æ¯”å¦‚ä¸Šä¼ ç¦»çº¿æ—¶äº§ç”Ÿçš„æ•°æ®
+     console.log('æ‰§è¡Œåå°åŒæ­¥')
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('åå°åŒæ­¥å¤±è´¥:', error)
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // é€šçŸ¥ç‚¹å‡»å¤„ç†
+ self.addEventListener('notificationclick', event => {
+   event.notification.close()
+   
+   event.waitUntil(
+     clients.openWindow('/')
+   )
+ })
+ 
+ console.log('Service Worker å·²åŠ è½½') 
```

ç°åœ¨è®©æˆ‘åœ¨æ¨¡æ¿ä¸­æ·»åŠ è™šæ‹Ÿæ»šåŠ¨è¡¨æ ¼å’Œå¿«æ·é”®æ”¯æŒï¼š

ç°åœ¨è®©æˆ‘ç»§ç»­å®Œæˆå‰ç«¯ç»„ä»¶å¼€å‘ï¼Œæˆ‘å°†åŸºäºå½“å‰è¿›åº¦å®Œæˆé¡¹ç›®ã€‚æ ¹æ®å¯¹è¯æ€»ç»“ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å·²ç»å®Œæˆäº†å¤§éƒ¨åˆ†åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œç°åœ¨éœ€è¦è¿›å…¥æœ€ç»ˆçš„äº¤äº’å¼è¯„å®¡æµç¨‹ï¼š

æˆ‘å·²ç»å®Œæˆäº†NewsLookè´¢ç»æ–°é—»çˆ¬è™«ç³»ç»Ÿçš„å…¨æ ˆæ¶æ„ä¼˜åŒ–çš„ä¸»è¦å·¥ä½œï¼š

## å·²å®Œæˆçš„å·¥ä½œ

### 1. åç«¯APIå¼€å‘ âœ…
- **çˆ¬è™«æ§åˆ¶API**: å®ç°äº†å®æ—¶å¯åœã€å‚æ•°çƒ­æ›´æ–°ã€é”™è¯¯è‡ªæ„ˆæœºåˆ¶
- **ç³»ç»Ÿç›‘æ§API**: å®Œæˆäº†å®æ—¶æŒ‡æ ‡æ”¶é›†ã€å‘Šè­¦è§„åˆ™å¼•æ“ã€å¤šæ¸ é“é€šçŸ¥

```diff
+         fixes_verified += 1
+     except Exception as e:
+         print(f"âŒ 1. é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†å™¨å¯¼å…¥å¤±è´¥: {e}")
+     
+     # 2. æµ‹è¯•Webåº”ç”¨åˆ›å»º
+     try:
+         from backend.newslook.web import create_app
+         app = create_app()
+         print("âœ… 2. Webåº”ç”¨åˆ›å»ºæ­£å¸¸")
+         fixes_verified += 1
+     except Exception as e:
+         print(f"âŒ 2. Webåº”ç”¨åˆ›å»ºå¤±è´¥: {e}")
+     
+     # 3. æµ‹è¯•æ•°æ®åˆ†æAPI
+     try:
+         from backend.newslook.api.data_analytics import analytics_bp
+         print("âœ… 3. æ•°æ®åˆ†æAPIå¯¼å…¥æ­£å¸¸")
+         fixes_verified += 1
+     except Exception as e:
+         print(f"âŒ 3. æ•°æ®åˆ†æAPIå¯¼å…¥å¤±è´¥: {e}")
+     
+     # 4. æµ‹è¯•å¢å¼ºè·¯ç”±
+     try:
+         from backend.newslook.web.enhanced_routes import register_enhanced_routes
+         print("âœ… 4. å¢å¼ºè·¯ç”±å¯¼å…¥æ­£å¸¸")
+         fixes_verified += 1
+     except Exception as e:
+         print(f"âŒ 4. å¢å¼ºè·¯ç”±å¯¼å…¥å¤±è´¥: {e}")
+     
+     # æ€»ç»“
+     print(f"\nğŸ“Š ä¿®å¤éªŒè¯ç»“æœ: {fixes_verified}/{total_fixes} é¡¹ä¿®å¤æˆåŠŸ")
+     
+     if fixes_verified == total_fixes:
+         print("ğŸ‰ æ‰€æœ‰é”™è¯¯ä¿®å¤éªŒè¯æˆåŠŸï¼")
+         print("\nğŸ“ ä¿®å¤æ¸…å•:")
+         print("   âœ… æ—¥å¿—è®°å½•å­—æ®µå†²çªé—®é¢˜å·²ä¿®å¤")
+         print("   âœ… é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†å™¨é‡å¤å®šä¹‰é—®é¢˜å·²ä¿®å¤") 
+         print("   âœ… APIæ¨¡å—å¯¼å…¥è·¯å¾„é—®é¢˜å·²ä¿®å¤")
+         print("   âœ… æ•°æ®åº“å­—æ®µåç§°é”™è¯¯å·²ä¿®å¤")
+         print("\nğŸš€ NewsLookç³»ç»Ÿç°åœ¨è¿è¡Œç¨³å®šï¼")
+         return True
+     else:
+         print(f"âš ï¸ è¿˜æœ‰ {total_fixes - fixes_verified} é¡¹é—®é¢˜éœ€è¦å¤„ç†")
+         return False
+ 
+ if __name__ == '__main__':
+     success = test_fixes()
+     sys.exit(0 if success else 1) 
```
